distinct
from PS_I_EMPLOYEE
order by ${orderByClause}

update PS_I_EMPLOYEE
STAFF_NO = #{record.staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATE_JOIN = #{record.dateJoin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAFF_NAME = #{record.staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECTION = #{record.section,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECTION_DESCRIPTION = #{record.sectionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EFFSEQ = #{record.effseq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
